ygData.subject: Re: Running Through Beholder
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You aren t lyin, friend - when I had said previously that the Beholder route was my favorite, I was referring to my experience during beta4. Evil eyes and
ygData.messageBody:
>From: "Michael Meadows" <meadows@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqbards] Running Through Beholder
>Date: Mon, 24 May 1999 19:08:30 -0400
>
>From: "Michael Meadows" <meadows@...>
>
>Is it possible to run through Beholder with Accelerando? I made the trip
>through last weekend crawling along high on the cliff and it was nerve
>wracking. I would much rather make a fast dash through and get it over
>with! But I saw at least a dozen evil eyes from my vantage point on the
>cliff wall...can I run past fast enough to avoid trouble?
>
> Paralto of Povar
>
>

You aren't lyin, friend - when I had said previously that the Beholder route
was my favorite, I was referring to my experience during beta4. Evil eyes
and muddites weren't as prevalent as then and it was a quick, easy trip (did
they even have muddites in beta? I never encountered one before), not to
mention the only mino you would ever see were Lessers on the way through. I
guess it's much easier after 20th?

Sartori D'Elsiraad
Bard of Kelethin
Veeshan
